update.name: MiXplorer v4.5.0 (201405121)
update.log:
v4.5.0: - Added Select "Only files" and "Items between" options to selection popup. - Added Shredder option to destroy files before deleting them. - Reordered TLS cipher suites for secure connections. - Removed locking folders, we only have startup lock. - Added selecting items from multiple tabs. - Added drag-drop items between tabs. - Fixed some UI problems. - Fixed some clouds problems. - Added Meo Cloud. - Removed MegaCloud and Ubuntu-one. - Added EncFS (Volume root folder must end with .encfs). - Fixed lots of tiny bugs.
v4.4.13: - Fixed auto remove finished tasks. - Fixed some History bugs. - Added new custom Search box for categories because of KitKat "global search" problem. - Added Rename shortcut. - Added getting public link from clouds (Share menu option). - Fixed samba folders size. - Added cleared list view mode. - Fixed History issues. - Added multi-line file names. - Fixed Some other tiny bugs.
